channel.title: Built a markdown to Evernote action with full formatting
channel.description:
Hey! This is my first post.
I have just built an action that converts markdown from Drafts to ENML compatible markup for Evernote.
This action preserves the following when saving to Evernote:
- All heading formatting up to h3 (max supported by new Evernote) - Line breaks and makes them Evernote compatable - All list indentations - Code blocks and make them Evernote compatible - Inline `code block` and formats as monospace font in Evernote - Checklists and todo lists with full functionality in Evernote to interact with them - All other standard markdown offcourse. - Tables with formatting improvements
What is the correct way to share my code/action file with the community?
![IMG_0034|666x500](upload://qTHeBQD1E1lItipuGEtA0yZXCu8.png)
Edit: Figured it out :) https://actions.getdrafts.com/a/1eN
